creator: bwtakacy@gmail.com
text:
In 1.2.16 and after, filter in log4j.properties has come to be supported  thanks of the below patch:

Bug 46049 - Filter support in PropertyConfigurator
https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=46049

But, there remains a misleading notation in JavaDoc of filter class.

====
Note that filtering is only supported by the DOMConfigurator. The PropertyConfigurator does not support filters.
====
